oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lovell School, ca. 1904
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lovell School (known as Richland School). Ca. 1904. Numbered IDs: 1. Frank Russell, 2. Frank Llewellyn, 3. Ben McSpadden, 4. Ellen Russell McFee, 5. Ruby McSpadden Dement, 6. Elsie Llewellyn, 7. Inez McSpadden Miller, 8. John R. Boring, 9. Nelson Russell, 10. Walter Powell.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: School children; Schools; Group portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
